target.description: Prepare selenium tests by starting up an OpenMeetings instance

target.description: Set the http port to some exotic numbers so that we don't conflict with anything

target.description: Will run all selenium tests unless -Dtestcases=_file_name_pattern_ will be passed

target.description: Will run all tests except selenium unless -Dtestcases=_file_name_pattern_ will be passed

target.description: performs DB related tasks based on passed DB type

target.description: Clears out Ivy cache and build folder
